channel.title: Cache issue
channel.description:
Okay, so when I try to get the Kasparscape cache to download on the client I get.....
[code]Kasparscape is loading.. java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\insidiaXV8cache\Maps\mapConfig.txt (The system cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.setNewMaps(client.java:111) at client.startUp(client.java:9047) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:6073) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) java.io.FileNotFoundException: http://dl.dropbox.com/u/42627902/Cache.zip at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance0(Native Method)
at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(Unknown Source)
at sun.reflect.DelegatingConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(Unknown Sou rce) at java.lang.reflect.Constructor.newInstance(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection$6.run(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection$6.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getChainedException(Unkno wn Source) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream(Unknown So urce) at Update.downloadFile(Update.java:109) at Update.<init>(Update.java:27) at client.streamLoaderForName(client.java:4766) at client.startUp(client.java:9057) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:6073) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Caused by: java.io.FileNotFoundException: http://dl.dropbox.com/u/42627902/Cache .zip at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream(Unknown So urce) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getHeaderField(Unknown So urce) at java.net.URLConnection.getHeaderFieldLong(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLConnection.getContentLengthLong(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLConnection.getContentLength(Unknown Source) at Update.downloadFile(Update.java:104) ... 6 more error [/code]
However, as soon as I change the name to insidiaXV8cache it works. What am I doing wrong?

item.title: Cache issue
item.dc:creator: @Kasparr Kasparr
item.description:
@Kasparr wrote:

But i’ve changed things in the cache. I don’t want insidias cache I want mine. I .zip’d my cache, changed the URL for downloading the cache in client and cachedownloader and it still recieved that error.

Read full topic

item.title: Cache issue
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

The DL link for the client is no longer valid. Find another IndsidiaX server and rename their cache.

Read full topic

item.description:

Okay, so when I try to get the Kasparscape cache to download on the client I get…

[code]Kasparscape is loading…
java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\insidiaXV8cache\Maps\mapConfig.txt (The system
